roleset.name: put in place
roleset.note: INSTALL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls appoint-29.1, put-9.1-1. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from install.01-v)
INSTALLMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT DF07. Framed by Claire. (from installment.01-n)

example.name: literal place
example.text: Digital, however, doesn't expect to displace IBM mainframes that-1 [*trace*-1]-2 are already installed *trace*-2 at big companies.

example.name: no place at all
example.text: The disagreement centers on testing deadlines and other issues involving [a FileNet system]-1 installed *trace*-1 earlier this year.

example.name: with agent, different kind of 'place'
example.text: In July, [11 NFL owners]-1, almost all of them new, blocked an effort *trace*-1 to install Jim Finks as a replacement for retiring league commissioner Pete Rozelle.
example.arg: as a replacement for retiring league commissioner Pete Rozelle

example.name: All args
example.text: His installment of new gang members in crucial positions...
